entry.message:
[DQC.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of 6,510,807,000 reported in the network role http://bankmillennium.com/xbrl/2020/roles/KapitaWasnyIZobowiazania should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 692,065,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://bankmillennium.com/xbrl/2020/roles/SprawozdanieZeZmianWKapitaleWasnym. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
Period : 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : PLN Decimals of RetainedEarnings : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/259400OFDZ9KPZEO8K78/2020-12-31/ESEF/PL/0/grupamillennium-2020-12-31.zip/grupamillennium-2020-12-31/reports/grupamillennium-2020-12-31.xhtml 11120
